mapper.select: SELECT id, `name`, birth, email, gender,signup_date, introduce1,introduce2,introduce3,file_name FROM tbl_teacher WHERE id=#{id}

SELECT c.id AS class_id, c.file_name, c.title, c.created_at, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_pay p WHERE p.class_id = c.id AND p.complete = 1 ) AS pay_count, avg(e.feedback_score) AS feedback_avg FROM tbl_class c LEFT JOIN tbl_enrollments e ON c.id = e.class_id WHERE c.teacher_id = #{teacher_id} GROUP BY c.id
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_teacher SET birth = #{birth}, file_name = #{file_name}, file_path = #{file_path}, file_size = #{file_size}, file_ext = #{file_ext}, introduce1 = #{introduce1}, introduce2 = #{introduce2}, introduce3 = #{introduce3} WHERE id = #{id}
